data.title: Moroccan Peaches flower
data.excerpt: The Department of Cannabis Control (DCC) is issuing this notice of voluntary recall for multiple Moroccan Peaches flower product(s) due to the presence of Aspergillus spp., and due to inaccurate labeling, that reports more cannabinoid content than the products contain.
